dcterms:creator: T.-Y. Lin
M. Maire
S. Belongie
J. Hays
P. Perona

dcterms:description: COCO is a popular benchmark for image captioning tasks, containing 123,287 images, with a common split of 113,287 training images, 5,000 validation images, and 5,000 testing images.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:creator: J. Lu
C. Xiong
D. Parikh
R. Socher
dcterms:description: Flickr30K consists of 31,783 images with a common split of 29,783 training images, 1,000 validation images, and 1,000 testing images, used for image captioning tasks.
dcterms:title: Flickr30K

dcterms:creator: T.-Y. Lin
M. Maire
S. Belongie
J. Hays
P. Perona
D. Ramanan
P. Dollár
C. L. Zitnick
dcterms:description: COCO captions are manually annotated captions for each image in the COCO dataset, with each image annotated with 5 captions.
dcterms:title: COCO captions

dcterms:creator: Y. Feng
L. Ma
W. Liu
J. Luo
dcterms:description: Shutterstock sentences dataset contains 2,282,444 different image captions collected from the Shutterstock website, used for unsupervised image captioning.
dcterms:title: Shutterstock sentences

dcterms:creator: P. Sharma
N. Ding
S. Goodman
R. Soricut
dcterms:description: Conceptual sentences dataset includes 3.3 million image-caption pairs collected from the web, used for automatic image captioning.
dcterms:title: Conceptual sentences
